pr_title: Fix querying broker packages on SDK 30

timeline.message: Fix querying broker packages on SDK 30

timeline.bodyText: we might want to move this down to < intent >
timeline.author: rpdome
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,9 @@
     <!-- Required for API Level 30 to make sure we can detect browsers that support custom tabs -->

timeline.bodyText: can we add comment specifying why we're doing this?
timeline.author: rpdome
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -17,6 +17,9 @@
     <!-- Required for API Level 30 to make sure we can detect browsers that support custom tabs -->
     <!-- https://developers.google.com/web/updates/2020/07/custom-tabs-android-11#detecting_browsers_that_support_custom_tabs -->
     <queries>
+        <package android:name="com.azure.authenticator" />
